alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 9:53AM EST until February 20 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Moderate to Major severity for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and major flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kentucky River near Ravenna. * WHEN...Until Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 31.0 feet, Major flooding occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM EST Saturday the stage was 31.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:15 AM EST Saturday was 31.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 31.1 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Monday morning. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 30.3 feet on 03/06/2015. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. The next statement will be issued by 8 PM EST Saturday.
